article_title: SEC Fights Turf War Over Asset Managers
article_text:
WASHINGTON—Senior U.S. officials are clashing over whether the asset-management industry poses risks to the financial system, setting up a fight over whether the industry should face tougher oversight.

Officials at the Securities and Exchange Commission, which currently regulates asset managers, have pushed back against a powerful yet little-known Treasury Department office that is laying the groundwork for Federal Reserve oversight...
